alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Coastal Liberty; Inland Bryan; Inland Liberty (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 5:27PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF BRYAN, LIBERTY AND CHATHAM COUNTIES... At 527 PM EDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm over Sunbury, or 11 miles south of Richmond Hill, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...strong winds 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar Indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Some locations in the path of this storm include... Halfmoon Landing, Sunbury, and Belfast. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so. You can also email your report to nws.charlestonsc@noaa.gov.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bryan; Coastal Chatham; Coastal Liberty; Inland Bryan; Inland Liberty
